page.title: 13ESTATE AGENT REPORT/WARKDEN
page.content: {Reeds Rains Walkden Estate Agents}sell about 18 houses per month. Terraced houses, the most popular amongst first time buyers cost about Â£18,000, semi detached about Â£28,000, detached Â£35,000 and a flat about Â£16,000. If you are between 18 and 80 you can qualify for a loan to buy the house, called a{mortgage.}You need a 10% deposit then you pay back the loan over 25 years with interest. Sometimes interest rates go so high people can not afford their mortgage and the house is taken off them.{ { Houses increase in price}due to a)increase in demand, b)inflation and c)increased building cost.{Houses {decrease in price}through neglect and plentiful supply in undesirable areas. More houses are sold in summer months because of spring weddings and good weather.
